thread.title: Global airlines rush to inspect engines after jet explosion

title: Global airlines rush to inspect engines after jet explosion
text:
Global airlines rush to inspect engines after jet explosion 3:20am IST - 01:52 
As the Southwest pilot in Tuesday's deadly jet explosion is hailed as hero, investigators are focused on the engine explosion and airlines around the world are rushing to inspect the safety of their fleet.   
As the Southwest pilot in Tuesday's deadly jet explosion is hailed as hero, investigators are focused on the engine explosion and airlines around the world are rushing to inspect the safety of their fleet.  //reut.rs/2JUt0p4
